alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Breathitt County through 630 PM EDT... At 544 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Portsmouth, or near Jackson, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Press, Sikes and Lunah around 550 PM EDT. Haddix and Howard Creek around 555 PM EDT. Flintville, Lost Creek, Copland and Saldee around 600 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Clayhole, Little, Hardshell, Watts, Whick, Noble and Ned. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
